Description:
A home full of comfort & room for the toys
This functional family home is the full package offering a generous sized block with a wide frontage and side access perfect for boats, trailers and caravans. Offering quality fittings and features throughout and located in one of the best pockets Craigieburn has to offer.
With great street appeal the modern facade invites you to a smart 4 bedroom home offering multiple living areas perfect for the whole family. All bedrooms are fitted with built in robes, the master suite with walk in robe and full ensuite with double vanity.
This complete family package is finished with a spacious living room which opens on to an undercover entertainment area. The large backyard is the ideal place for kids to run wild whilst the blocks extra wide frontage delivers the ability for recreational vehicles to access side yard and adds scope for more garaging or storage.
The long list of other features include double remote garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and much more.
Located in a quiet family friendly pocket with parklands, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central, Splash Aquatic Centre, multiple Primary Schools and childcares all within a close proximity.
This is a rare opportunity to secure a perfect family home! Don't miss out!
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 32 Grevillea Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Entertainers Delight
The Phone Code for this property is: 88144. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
Simply brilliant design, 4 bedrooms all with BIR, with 2 living zones as well as 2 outdoor entertaining areas.
You will be truly spoilt for choice when inviting friends and family over.
The impressive master bedroom is complete with WIR and private ensuite, a stylish 2nd bathroom with separate toilet considers the easy flow of amenities.
Well designed kitchen consisting of 2 pantry's you will not be short on storage, 900mm oven, stainless steel dishwasher sleek stone top benchtop and breakfast bar.
Other stand out features are the impressive high ceilings enhanced by plantation shutters enveloping the open plan lounge / dining area.
Not to be missed in this family home is a double garage with internal access, evaporative cooling, ducted heating,alarm system, video intercom, electric external shutters to the front as well as established low maintenance front and rear yards.
This could be the "one"

Description:
Location, Location, Location
Lovingly Maintained and presented with pride is this delightful family home located in Craigieburn's most sought after pocket, situated within walking distance to Craigieburn Railway, Craigieburn shopping centre, public transport, schools, parklands and much more.
Servicing all types of family needs with 4 spacious bedrooms upstairs and another two bedrooms downstairs adjoining a full central bathroom.
Property highlights include but not limited to:
• 6 Bedrooms BIR
• Hard wood floor boards
• Spacious living
• Spacious central bathroom with bath
• Ducted heating
• spilt system cooling and heating
• Formal lounge
• Formal dining
• Updated kitchen adjoining open plan meals
• Retreat
• Security Cameras
• Alarm system
• Ceilings fans in all bedrooms
Don't miss out an inspection is highly recommended

Description:
Style & Quality
If you are looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go. This property is sure to impress, with features on hand such as open plan kitchen/meals/family area, stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, ducted heating and split system cooling, main bathroom & much more. Located within walking distance to local transport, Hume highway, schools and shops this property is ideal for the first home, investment or retiree offering a blend of low maintenance living without compromising on space or comfort. This one won't hang around for long, call now for an inspection...

Description:
Live close to Craigieburn Train station
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this meticulously maintained brick veneer home on a great location. Walking distance to the Craigieburn train station and to Craigieburn Primary and Secondary school. Offering so many options to the buyers.
Located in a quiet court this home offers 4 bedrooms (master bedroom with semi-ensuite), 2 family living areas, kitchen with gas cooktop, woodfire and gas heating system and spacious laundry, one central bathroom with a separate toilet, and carport.
Situated only moments away from amenities such as Craigieburn Primary and Secondary School, Craigieburn Plaza, Hothlyn Drive Children's Centre, Nido Childcare Craigieburn, Primary Medical Centre Craigieburn, Family Health Medical Centre, local shops.
Here lies an opportunity for investors or first home buyer to enter the marketplace. Don't miss out! Call: Jaidev - 0466 052 158
Achal Arora- 0432 413 929

Description:
PERFECT FAMILY LIVING ON 707M2 (Approx)
A classic entertainer, this conveniently located home is packed with a list of features that the whole family will enjoy. Updated and modernised the home features a Galley Style kitchen that segregates the dual living zones that comprises of a large lounge with adjacent meals area and intimate family room with built in cabinetry. An array of bedroom accommodation includes a master with walk in robes, ceilings fan and floor to ceiling tiled ensuite. The remaining robed bedrooms all are complemented by central bathroom which boasts mirrored shaving cabinets and spa bath.
A long driveway with lock up gates is the ideal place to house boats, caravan and trailers, whilst the double garage with drive through access and workshop is a haven for tradespeople/ handymen-women. Outside you will discover an extra-large decked pergola area that overlooks backyard, cubby house and above ground swimming pool.
Packed with stone benches, 900mm appliances, dishwasher, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, pelmet drapes and floorboards. Situated in a quiet court location with easy access to transport, schools, train station and shops, this is a home that has it all.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
Ideal Entry or Impressive Investment!
On a sizeable sub-divided allotment (1 of only 2 on the block), this single-level home
provides a value-packed lifestyle central to everything Craigieburn has to enjoy making a perfect choice for first-time buyers, young families & savvy investors alike.
Light & bright interior comprises 3 bedrooms (large master) all with built-in robes & central bathroom, along with a spacious lounge leading through to the meals area & adjoining kitchen complete with gas cooker. Other features of the home include gas heating, full-size laundry & separate WC, plus a north-facing rear courtyard & the added appeal of a remote-control garage.
Cimberwood Drive buses at the end of the street, it's also walking distance to Malcolm Creek
parkland & endless trails, close to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, primary & secondary schools, as well as easy freeway access.

Description:
Nothing Less Than A Display!!
A fantastic opportunity to buy this magnificent 4 Bedroom house in the heart of Lakeside estate in Craigieburn. Location doesn't get any better than this, with schools, Shopping Centre, parks and public transport just a short stroll away. Set on a generous 400 sqm allotment, the floorplan is skillfully designed to maximise utility.
With 4 generous sized bedrooms (master with an ensuite and WIR and remaining 3 bedrooms with Walk In/ Built In Robes), multiple living areas and quality fittings and fixtures throughout, this house will tick most of your boxes. When it comes to space it caters to all large and growing families with an open plan living area and a great sized kitchen with quality cabinetry and 900mm stainless-steel appliances.
An abundance of light, luxury and living space defines this exceptional family home situated in a privileged position, only minutes from Craigieburn Central and beautiful parklands.
This home is designed to accommodate both growing family and first home buyers.
The premium inclusions of this property aren't limited to :-
Tasmanian Oak floor throughout the living and Walkway with plush carpet in the bedrooms.
2.7m ceilings with square set finishes.
LED Downlights throughout the house
Tri zoned refrigerated system heating and cooling
40mm stone bench tops throughout
900 stainless steel appliances
Day and Night blinds with Pelmets
Wrapped around fencing with Bamboo feature wall and manicured lawn in the rear yard.
Solar Hot water system
Solar Electricity
Exposed aggregate driveway
Window niches
sealed concrete around the house
Intercom and alarm with provisions for CCTV
& many more. Inspection would Definitely Impress!!

Description:
Family Excellence with Indoor Style to Match!
In a family-focused Highlands neighbourhood with close proximity to all amenities lies this freestanding 3 bedroom home delivering a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle of contemporary quality, floorplan flexibility & urban practicality.
The home's inviting interior comprises a master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms all with built-in robes & spotless central bathroom. Dual living zones include a separate lounge & spacious open-plan family/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed, stone-topped kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other features include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, family-sized laundry, rear outdoor deck and wonderfully manicured back garden, internally-accessed double garage (remote-controlled) & much much more!
Throw away the car keys forever as the home is literally within seconds from a beautiful park, Highlands Shopping centre & a stone's throw away from transportation, it also is within walking distance to all levels of schooling & easy access to the Hume Freeway.
If space, quality & location are high on your agenda then this home is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list!
* Auction held at Hume Tennis & Community Centre- 225 Marathon Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
UNDER OFFER
Modern Style in a Perfect Position!
Entry-level excellence or investment perfection, this modern two-storey townhouse is a winning choice either way with its cleverly-designed interior, quality features throughout and ideal location overlooking the open spaces of Anzac Park. Impeccably presented, the home's light-filled interior comprises two double bedrooms (both with BIRs), stylish central bathroom and additional powder room (second WC). Add to this a separate lounge, study/retreat (upstairs) and open-plan living/dining area enhanced by a sleek stone-bench kitchen complete with tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights include split-system heating and cooling, concealed laundry facilities, undercover balcony with park views, plus a private rear courtyard and remote-control garage. Walking distance to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre and a choice of bus routes, Splash Leisure Centre, sports and recreational facilities, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails along with a range of primary and secondary schools.

Description:
Luxury, Location and Sensational Family Flexibility
An environment of amazing space & uncompromised quality, this beautifully-appointed
residence provides the ultimate family lifestyle experience with its versatile design, fabulous living/entertaining zones & revered Mt Ridley location.
Bold & beautiful with high ceilings throughout, the home's expansive interior showcases an
enormous master bedroom/retreat with large walk-in robe & luxurious spa ensuite, 3 supplementary bedrooms (built-in robes), home office/5th bedroom & 2 additional bathrooms (one on each level).
Adaptable to the needs of any growing family, the home's impressive living spaces include a
light-filled lounge, kids' rumpus area (upstairs), separate entertaining room & vast open-plan living/dining areas complemented by a gourmet kitchen with soft-close drawers, Technika
appliances & adjoining butler's pantry/second kitchen with its own sink & cooking facilities.
Heating & cooling throughout, the home also features a comprehensive security system
(alarm, CCTV & video intercom), large laundry with ample cupboard space, solar/gas hot
water, efficient LED lighting, floor-to-ceiling tiles (all bathrooms) & stone benchtops
throughout.
Step outside to discover an expansive undercover entertaining area & delightful low-maintenance backyard complete with pond/water feature, plus the added appeal of a remote-
control double garage with internal entry.
Close to Mt Ridley's array of parks & playgrounds, endless Malcolm Creek trails, Aitken
Boulevard buses & Highlands Shopping Centre, as well as popular schools including Mount
Ridley College, Mother Teresa Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar.
*Inspection by appointment only

Description:
Comfort & Character in Central Location
More than meets the eye, this home is set to impress with its low maintenance living & instant access to all Craigieburn amenities. Whether you're a first home buyer, looking to downsize or add to your investment portfolio this is a MUST SEE!
Beyond its character filled facade, this home offers 3 good size bedrooms with built-in robes, central bathroom, separate WC, well appointed kitchen with an open plan meals area & large family room.
Step outside & be greeted by an oversized entertaining area perfect for private large scale gatherings. With a host of extras including heating, cooling, garden shed, car accommodation & much more.
All perfectly located close to schools, local shops, childcare centre, public transport, parklands & recreational facilities. An opportunity not to be missed. Call now!
* Auction held at Hume Tennis & Community Centre- 225 Marathon Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Family Entertainer in a Whisper Quiet Location
This exceptional residence provides a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle with its free-flowing design, impressive living/entertaining areas & blissfully quiet cul-de-sac location.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior highlights a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes), optional 5th bedroom/large study, main family bathroom & separate WC.
Formal & informal living zones include an elegant lounge & spacious open family/dining area leading out to the enormous al-fresco style entertaining room complete with built-in BBQ perfect for the all seasons entertainer.
Other stand-out features include a well-appointed kitchen with ample cupboard & bench space, dishwasher & deep pantry, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, family-sized laundry & linen storeroom. Step outside discover a great sized backyard with leafy outlook, lush turf for kids to play on & a double garage with drive-thru access.
Located within a short stroll to Schools, shops, parklands and public transport. This home is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list!
* Auction held at Hume Tennis & Community Centre- 225 Marathon Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Luxury, Lifestyle and Family Living
Positioned in one of Craigieburn's most highly sought-after pocket's, you will find this modern residence that ticks all the right boxes.
Offering 4 very generously size bedrooms, a master with a view, full ensuite & WIR, another 3 great size bedrooms consisting of BIR's. A second modern bathroom with free standing bath and tremendous gas wall heater.
Downstairs we have an open plan living area consisting of dinning/kitchen/living, plus a study. A low maintenance yard perfect for any family or investor.
Features include:
*Intercom system
*Double remote-controlled garage
*Refrigerated cooling and ducted heating, plus 2 gas wall heaters
*Modern finishes
*900ml stainless steel appliances
*Quality Wood flooring throughout
*40ml stone benchtops
*Internal access from double garage
Inspection is a must on this amazing property as it will not last long.
Disclaimer: Some of the photos are not the current state of the property. All upstairs is all floorboards not carpet

Description:
4 BEDROOMS, 4 LIVING AREAS & STUDY ON 700M2
Set proudly on 700m2 (approx.) be welcomed by its impressive classic facade & fastidiously manicured garden & be graced by the homes impressive interior that flaunts a touch of class, style & captivating spaces.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms & 4 Living areas (oversized master with walk-in robe & en-suite), large study or home office, fully equipped kitchen with ample cupboard space, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher & an abundance of storage space overlooking a large family & meals area accompanied by an oversized covered extravagant alfresco area ready to entertain family & friends all year round leading to a perfectly large manicured backyard.
Journey on through the home to a separate lounge/entertainment area & an impressive rumpus/theatre room offering plenty of options for the growing family. Added to this is a downstairs powder room, roomy laundry, oversized garage with drive thru access, high ceilings, refrigerated cooling & ducted heating with the added comfort of split system in three bedrooms. Furthermore, upstairs contains its very own private retreat area, 4 great size bedrooms serviced by the striking main bathroom.
This aspirational family home provides the perfect lifestyle in one of Craigieburn's most sought-after-pockets. Centrally located and close by to all of Craigieburn's amenities including local schools, public transport, beautiful parklands and walking trails, Craigieburn Central and the new Splash Aquatic and Leisure Centre this home is well suited for all. This is an amazing opportunity to secure a home that provides for growing families. Be quick as this one won't hang around for long. Inspection will not disappoint!!
